DESCRIPTION: Adds/removes a role from the self assignable list to yourself.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}role** ~ Display all possible selfassignable roles for users.
NO_PUBLIC_ROLES: There are no roles available to self-assign. Please contact a moderator/admin of the server.
MISSING_MANAGE_ROLES: I do not have the **Manage Role** permissions to give or remove a role. Please contact a moderator/admin of the server.
NEED_ROLE: You did not provide any role to edit that role for you.
BOT_TOO_LOW: My highest role is not high enough to edit that role for you.
SELF_REMOVE: User used the role command to remove this role.
SELF_ASSIGN: User used the role command to assign this role.
REMOVED: The {{role}} role has been removed from you as per your wishes sire.
ADDED: The {{role}} role has been given to you. It's time to boogie!
NOT_PUBLIC: This role is not a public role so it can not be assigned to yourself.
REASSIGN_ON_JOIN: Re-assign roles when members join is enabled.
